author: travelandtourworld.com
title: CONVENE to Partner with TMF Dialogue MarketingTravelandtourworld.com
text:
CONVENE to Partner with TMF Dialogue Marketing Published on : Saturday, August 22, 2015
For the second year CONVENE will be working in partnership with tmf dialogue marketing to bring a group of German hosted buyers with the MICE capabilities of the Baltic Sea Region.
Every year, CONVENE offers a fully hosted buyer programme which accommodates more than 160 qualified buyers from across Europe. Programme includes not only face to face meetings during two days in the exhibition but also a familiarisation with Lithuania and other region destinations.
As in CONVENE 2015, Johanna Fisher, Managing Director of tmf dialogue marketing will join speaker list in 2016. In 2015, she gave an overview on the German outbound meetings market and insights about using digital content in B2B Communication.
Source: CONVENE
